question: Zoe and Ben opened the puzzle book to a page showing rows of trees. Skip count backwards by 100s starting from 400 and fill in the missing numbers.
A puzzle about hills asked Zoe and Ben to skip count backwards by 100s from 625. Fill in the missing numbers.
n a puzzle about the stream, they had to skip count backwards by 100s starting from 570. Fill in the missing numbers.
The puzzle about cottages asked Zoe and Ben to skip count backwards by 100s starting from 454. Fill in the missing numbers.
The puzzle about windmills asked them to skip count backwards by 100s starting from 399. Fill in the missing numbers.
The puzzle about vegetable gardens asked them to skip count backwards by 100s starting from 1400. Fill in the missing numbers.
Zoe and Ben saw rows of sunflowers in a puzzle. Skip count backwards by 100s starting from 1850 and fill in the missing numbers.
